bibl.title: Hermetica. The Greek Corpus Hermeticum and the Latin Asclepius in a new English translation, with notes and introduction.
bibl.note: Nombreuses allusions aux P.G.M. Voir en part. pp. xxxii-xl: Technical and theoretical Hermetica.
COPENHAVER Brian P., Hermetica. The Greek Corpus Hermeticum and the Latin Asclepius in a new English translation, with notes and introduction.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 1992, 8°, lxxxiv-320 pp. ISBN 0-521-36144-3. £45.
